price: 54. (Waxaana dirnay) Luud markuu ku lahaa qolodiisii: Ma waxaad la imanaysaan faaxisho19 idinkoo arka20?
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes:
19. Faaxishah wax xille oo foolxun waxaa halkan loola jeedaa zinada iyo ficilkii qoomu luud -Falalka khaniisnimada ah, iwm.
20. Si caddaan ah, tafsiir kale waa idinkoo ogsoon inay tahay denbi weyn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
